title: guruvE sharaNam en
sahitya:
guruvE sharaNam en guruvE sharaNam sharaNam


anupallavi

  pArinil vazhi kATTiyAi (ipp) iruL vazhi selgaiyil pArkkum kaNgaLAi oLI kUTTiyE vazhi kATTuvAi


caraNam     mOna nilai tanilum magizhindu maikAttiDum jnAna vaDivE nallOrkkeLiyamE
nAvinil inimaiyum nallaramum payila nIyE tuNai sei dayAnidhiyE
